sentences.en: Sam is the seven-year-old son of Eric Davies.
sentences.cn: 萨姆是埃里克•戴维斯的7岁儿子。

sentences.en: The seven-year-old was found crying with scratches on his face and neck.
sentences.cn: 那个7岁的孩子被找到时正在哭，脸上和颈上都有划伤。

sentences.en: A seven-year-old boy was found dead after a landslide engulfed an apartment block.
sentences.cn: 山崩掩埋了一座公寓楼之后，一名7岁的男孩被发现遇难。
